text.div:
This code system http://example.org/CodeSystem/fh-code-system defines the following codes:

CodeDisplaySpanish (es)
cancer Have your parents had cancer before age 50?¿Tus padres tuvieron cáncer antes de los 50 años?
diabetes Has anyone in your family been diagnosed with diabetes?¿Alguien en su familia ha sido diagnosticado con diabetes?

name: FamilyHistoryCodeSystem
title: Family History survey code system
description: The code system for family health survey.

concept.display: Have your parents had cancer before age 50?

designation.value: ¿Tus padres tuvieron cáncer antes de los 50 años?

concept.display: Has anyone in your family been diagnosed with diabetes?

designation.value: ¿Alguien en su familia ha sido diagnosticado con diabetes?
